verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Rejoice in the Lord Always newline And I again I say and again I say newline Rejoice in the lord always, newline And again I say and again I say rejoice,

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Come bless the Lord newline Come bless the Lord newline Draw near to worship Christ the Lord, newline And Bless his name, his holy name, newline Declaring he is good,

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: O that men would praise him, newline O that men would praise him,

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: O that men would praise his name, newline Praise his name to the ends of the earth, newline O that men would praise his name, newline Praise his name to the ends of the earth,

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: And again I say and I again I say, newline Again I say, Again I say, Again I say, Again I say, newline Rejoice! newline Rejoice- Rejoice, newline Rejoice, Rejoice
